summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to contracting indebtedness; authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of limited tax general obligation refunding bonds and unlimited tax general obligation refunding bonds, in one or more series, for the purpose of paying all or part of the cost of refunding certain of the City's outstanding limited tax general obligation bonds and unlimited tax general obligation bonds, and the costs of issuing and selling the bonds; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the bonds; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with the disposition of the proceeds of the bonds.
